Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Malibu in 1971...
Had first career hit on 8/21/1973, off Gaspar Salas (PG)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/8/1974, off Tanner Fye (CBC)...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/1/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $2,250,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1979, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/15/1982 to a 4-year deal worth $2,361,700 per year...
